About Me

2023-06-01

I'm an Platform Engineer, based in good o'l Melbourne, Australia.

I am currently working at Azenix, a leading Microsoft consultancy specalizing in Azure where I had the privilege of immersing myself in the world of automation. My journey has revolved around leveraging CI/CD tools and harnessing the power of Terraform to shape and streamline processes on the Azure platform. It has been incredibly fulfilling to witness the successful implementation of infrastructure projects using Azure DevOps, which continue to empower organizations to this day.

Honestly, I am quite new to Azure, let alone Cloud / Platform Engineering with 2 years of experience. I created this blog to share insights, lessons, and experiences acquired through my journey. I hope you will find my blog useful enough that it can help you with your pet project or your own cloud journey.
